title: We Know What Death Stranding Is About - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.21.19
description:
Praise be to GamesRadar! Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Josh West's preview of Death Stranding's gameplay!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:10 - Housekeeping
PAX is next week! Guild Wars event Friday morning, KFGShowcase Friday at 4:30, Inter-Site Championship Saturday at 9! kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:17:35 - Someone Finally Explains Death Stranding, Josh West @ GamesRadar Required reading - https://www.gamesradar.com/death-stranding-news/
00:23:05 - GameStop Lays Off More than 100, nearly half of GI, Jason @ Kotaku
00:36:55 - Publish Your Games Somewhere Else
00:41:10 - Are games as service required to have giant, dissertation sized breakdowns to be understood and perhaps forgiven for mistakes? Best Friend Q - Legend Of Kanto
00:52:35 - Best Friend Q - Do you believe Microsoft when they claim they have "no plans" to release more Xbox exclusives on PS4 or, more importantly, the Switch?  - Chad Betteridge
00:55:28 - MK Adds Terminator and Joker
00:57:38 - Out today
Reader mail   -
01:01:18 - Not a question, but a thank you. - TJ
01:04:32 - Squad Up: Jonny Samsonite(IRL) - @swanja311 on Twitter
01:05:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Andrea
